title: Local marketplace scraper
blurb: GUI for item+city filters; runs periodically and emails matches. Solve ‘new’ items that are actually old.

title: AntiSocial MVP
blurb: Text‑first, TikTok‑style feed of your own ideas → tap to chat; progressive summary + one elite question.

title: Ideas on religion
blurb: Clarify beliefs, key questions, and reading map drawn from your ChatGPT history.

title: Open RAG Data Library
blurb: Curate real, open datasets devs can use to test RAG systems—clean docs, licenses, and examples.

title: EarlyBird AI clients (Tampa Bay)
blurb: Website + Google + Facebook live. Pilot in‑person AI Q&A at coffee shops to build trust and pipeline.
